overview: Teppei Kojima is a lazy husband who can't take it long at work. His wife Yuko is angry with her husband, but supports the family finances. On their wedding day, something happens to Yuko. Teppei is shocked when he first learns the truth at the hospital. Just as he is making a serious effort to support his wife, Yuko leaves. The two come face to face at the site of their memories. What is the decision they come to after their marital differences, fears and conflicts....?
title: Katyū no Yado
